reference_summary:
{'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Brian Percival', 'Andy Goddard', 'Jeremy Webb', 'David Evans'], 'Producers': ['Liz Trubridge', 'Gareth Neame', 'Julian Fellowes', 'Rebecca Eaton'], 'Starring': ['Huge Bonneville', 'Michelle Dockery', 'Maggie Smith'], 'Studio': ['BritBox']}
I am late in watching this show. Now, I can't wait to watch the next episode. I love the acting, the scenery the costumes and the in-depth story line. It is a mastery piece of work!
Mastery
Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa Extended Version
Comedy, Feel-good, Outrageous, Fun
['Johnny Knoxville reprises his Jackass role as 86-year-old Irving Zisman in the story of a crotchety old man unexpectedly saddled with the care of his 8-year-old grandson Billy (Jackson Nicoll). Extended Version']
{'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jeff Tremaine'], 'Producers': ['Johnny Knoxville', 'Spike Jonze', 'Jeff Tremaine', 'Derek Freda', 'Trip Taylor'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Knoxville']}
I would give it a minus 5 if there was a star for that. This is meant for the twenty something guy crowd. It was disgusting and embarrassing. The reviews said it was about a boy and his grandfather.  I never even got that far, it was so horrid.  I am too embarrassed to say how the movie even begins. My husband stared at me in disbelief. It is definitely not a family movie.  I guess I should have turned it off as soon as I saw "Jackass Presents..." I am in the dark, but not anymore.  Leave this for the guys and their immature minds.
It was disgusting and embarrassing
